name: Vinyl Record Guitar Picks
description:
Jonny's Picks

Now you can make new music from old music with recycling at it's finest. This 5 pack of recycled guitar picks are made from broken and scratched vinyl records letting you rest assure that no music was harmed in the making of these guitar picks. They produce a sharper sound compared to traditional guitar picks because they are a firm (Heavy) pick with the thickness around 1.9mm. Made for the hard hitting performers that love to rock out and the grooves give it a nice grip. Order some today!

See our FAQ section to help answer any questions you may have or message us.

Tweet us on www.Twitter.com/JonnysPicks Like us on www.Facebook.com/JonnysPicks & Follow us on www.Instagram.com/JonnysPicks

-100% Recycled in the U.S.A.- Saving the world, one guitar solo at a time.

name: 5 Guitar Picks Star
description:
Jonny's Picks
Our star pack features 5 guitar picks laid out in a star design on sweet Jonny's Picks card backing. This pack is great for the guitar pick collector that wants an original pack of pick, all the way to the most advanced guitar players. We know your going to enjoy the originality just as much as how they play.

Our guitar picks are made by hand in the USA using 100% recycled credit cards and gift cards. Each guitar pick has it's own original design that your going to love. These guitar picks are on the medium to light side. Order some today!

See our FAQ section to help answer any questions you may have or message us.

-100% Recycled in the U.S.A.- Saving the world, one guitar solo at a time.

name: Turn your own cards into picks**
description:
Jonny's Picks

~~~NOW AVAILABLE!!!!!~~~

Do you have your own gift cards, ID's, credit cards that you would like to turn into guitar picks? Well, we can make them for you. We can get 5 picks from a normal size card like shown in the default image.

To place your order: 1. Mail your cards to us. (e-mail us for our mailing address)

2. Pay here for how ever many cards you mailed. Example, if you mailed us 5 cards than when you check-out you will purchase 5.

3. We will turn them into guitar picks once we receive the cards and the payment. you will get 5 picks from a normal size card.

4. We mail them back to you.

See the samples below for the layout of how we turn a card into picks. If you would like a specific pick of something on the card like a name of photo please contact us and let us know. This may result in less guitar picks per card.
If you have any questions at all don't hesitate to contact us.

Let the fun begin.

Check out some of these samples
